channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【Password reuse is rampant: nearly half of observed user logins are compromised】密码重复使用猖ramp：将近一半的用户登录被妥协
item.description: 【 Nearly half of observed login attempts across websites protected by Cloudflare involved leaked credentials. The pervasive issue of password reuse is enabling automated bot attacks on a massive scale. 】在受Cloudflare保护的网站上，几乎一半的观察到的登录尝试涉及泄漏的凭据。密码重复使用的普遍问题是可以大规模地进行自动机器人攻击。

item.title: 【Advancing account security as part of Cloudflare’s commitment to CISA’s Secure by Design pledge】作为Cloudflare对CISA安全的承诺，推进帐户安全性，设计保证
item.description: 【 Cloudflare has made significant progress in boosting multi-factor authentication (MFA) adoption. With the addition of Apple and Google social logins, we’ve made secure access easier for our users. 】Cloudflare在提高多因素身份验证（MFA）采用方面取得了重大进展。随着Apple和Google社交登录的增加，我们使用户更容易获得安全访问。

item.title: 【Conventional cryptography is under threat. Upgrade to post-quantum cryptography with Cloudflare Zero Trust】传统的密码学受到威胁。用CloudFlare零信任升级到量子后加密
item.description: 【 We’re thrilled to announce that organizations can now protect their sensitive corporate network traffic against quantum threats by tunneling it through Cloudflare’s Zero Trust platform. 】我们很高兴地宣布，组织现在可以通过Cloudflare的零信任平台对其敏感的公司网络流量来保护其敏感的公司网络流量免受量子威胁。

item.title: 【One platform to manage your company’s predictive security posture with Cloudflare】通过CloudFlare管理公司的预测安全姿势的一个平台
item.description: 【 Cloudflare introduces a single platform for unified security posture management, helping protect SaaS and web applications deployed across various environments. 】CloudFlare引入了一个用于统一安全姿势管理的平台，有助于保护在各种环境中部署的SaaS和Web应用程序。

item.title: 【Extending Cloudflare Radar’s security insights with new DDoS, leaked credentials, and bots datasets】使用新的DDO，泄漏的凭据和机器人数据集扩展CloudFlare Radar的安全见解
item.description: 【 For Security Week 2025, we are adding several new DDoS-focused graphs, new insights into leaked credential trends, and a new Bots page to Cloudflare Radar. 】在2025年安全周中，我们正在添加几个新的以DDOS为中心的图形，对泄漏凭证趋势的新见解以及新的机器人页面为CloudFlare Radar。

item.title: 【Unleashing improved context for threat actor activity with our Cloudforce One threat events platform】使用我们的Cloudforce一个威胁事件平台释放提高的威胁参与者活动的上下文
item.description: 【 Gain real-time insights with our new threat events platform. This tool empowers your cybersecurity defense with actionable intelligence to stay ahead of attacks and protect your critical assets. 】通过我们的新威胁事件平台获得实时见解。该工具通过可行的情报使您的网络安全防御能力保持领先地位并保护您的关键资产。

item.title: 【Enhanced security and simplified controls with automated botnet protection, cipher suite selection, and URL Scanner updates】具有自动僵尸网络保护，密码套件和URL扫描仪更新的增强安全性和简化控件
item.description: 【 Enhanced security, simplified control! This Security Week, Cloudflare unveils automated botnet protection, flexible cipher suites, and an upgraded URL Scanner. 】增强的安全性，简化控制！在安全周，CloudFlare揭示了自动化的僵尸网络保护，灵活的密码套件和升级的URL扫描仪。

item.title: 【Cloudflare enables native monitoring and forensics with Log Explorer and custom dashboards】CloudFlare可以使用Log Explorer和自定义仪表板启用本机监视和取证
item.description: 【 Today we are excited to announce support for Zero Trust datasets, and custom dashboards where customers can monitor critical metrics for suspicious or unusual activity. 】今天，我们很高兴宣布对零信任数据集的支持，以及客户可以监视关键指标的可疑或异常活动的自定义仪表板。

item.title: 【Email Security now available for free for political parties and campaigns through Cloudflare for Campaigns】现在，通过Cloudflare进行竞选活动，可以免费提供政党和竞选活动的电子邮件安全
item.description: 【 We’re excited to announce that Cloudflare for Campaigns now includes Email Security, adding an extra layer of protection to email systems that power political campaigns. 】我们很高兴地宣布，广告系列的CloudFlare现在包括电子邮件安全性，为政治活动提供电动的电子邮件系统增加了额外的保护层。

item.title: 【Upgraded Turnstile Analytics enable deeper insights, faster investigations, and improved security】升级的旋转门分析可实现更深入的见解，更快的调查和改进的安全性
item.description: 【 Introducing new Turnstile Analytics: Gain insight into your visitor traffic, bot behavior patterns, traffic anomalies, and attack attributes. 】引入新的旋转门分析：洞悉访客流量，机器人行为模式，流量异常和攻击属性。
